biocontainers.name: deepvariant
biocontainers.summary: Deepvariant is an analysis pipeline that uses a deep neural network to call genetic variants from next-generation dna sequencing data

biotools.summary: DeepVariant is a deep learning-based variant caller that takes aligned reads (in BAM or CRAM format), produces pileup image tensors from them, classifies each tensor using a convolutional neural network, and finally reports the results in a standard VCF or gVCF file.

bioschemas.name: DeepVariant
bioschemas.summary: DeepVariant is a deep learning-based variant caller that takes aligned reads (in BAM or CRAM format), produces pileup image tensors from them, classifies each tensor using a convolutional neural network, and finally reports the results in a standard VCF or gVCF file.
